content.prompt: William’s description of his status within the English government is best explained by which of the following?

choices.label: The creation of an oligarchical system of government in William’s home country of the Netherlands
The increasing diplomatic tensions created by England’s expanding colonial empire
The assertion of parliamentary supremacy over the monarchy in the English government
The desire of William to impose an absolutist system of government on England

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
